column4: Anyone know the specific time for the 7.04 to relase? Does it go after the UK time or?
I'd stick with regularily visiting the ubuntu-page for an announcement.
-> Sounds good ... but it is a bit strange that we don't get an official release time
Yes, but as far as I know, it's not even 100% sure, that the final Feisty will be released on 19th April.
